mapper.sql: id, condition_id, user_id, trigger_time, direction, fund_code, amount, is_postpone, is_maintain, is_liquidation, last_modified_time, created_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fund_fixed_investment_condition_record(id, condition_id, user_id, trigger_time, direction, fund_code, amount, is_postpone, is_maintain, is_liquidation) VALUES(#{id}, #{conditionId}, #{userId}, #{triggerTime}, #{direction}, #{fundCode}, #{amount}, #{isPostpone}, #{isMaintain}, #{isLiquidation})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM fund_fixed_investment_condition_record WHERE condition_id = #{conditionId} ORDER BY created_time DESC LIMIT 1
